launcher_localization.pw_is_already_running: ParaWorld is already running. Start PWKiller?
launcher_localization.launcher_is_already_running: This programm is already running. Please close the running version first!
launcher_localization.reset_settings: This will reset your Settings.cfg file, and some saved data (like last IP addresses) will be lost. Do you really want to continue?
launcher_localization.reset_settings_success: Replaced Settings.cfg with Settings_SSSS_backup.cfg. Some options might have been reset to an old state!
launcher_localization.overwrite_backup: Backup file already exists. Overwrite backup file?
launcher_localization.backup_created: Created Settings_SSSS_backup.cfg from Settings.cfg. This one will be used when settings.cfg becomes corrupt.
launcher_localization.settings_missing: Settings.cfg not found. If you have never run ParaWorld on this system before, you must run it first to create the necessary files.
launcher_localization.bp_missing: BoosterPack is not installed, please install it first. You can download it from Para-Welt.com or ParaWorld ModDB.
launcher_localization.switch_sss_error: Failed to switch server side scripts.
launcher_localization.ask_backup: Do you want to try to use the backup file?

pwkiller_localization.pwkiller_label: If ParaWorld crashes or does not terminate, press this button!
